type.name: Magic Clutch
type.description: Magic Clutch Ring is a Ring in Dungeons and Dragons. Increases magic attack by 15% Increases incoming physical damage 10% Weight: 0.8

type.name: Hornet Ring
type.description: Hornet Ring is a Ring in Dungeons and Dragons. The % of critical damage increased now depends on infusion, weapon upgrade level, wether you back stab or riposte, and the weapon itself. Weight: 1.1

type.name: Young Dragon Ring
type.description: Young Dragon is Ring in Dungeons and Dragons. BoostsÂ damage by 12% Weight: 0.7

type.name: Red Tearstone Ring
type.description: Red Tearstone Ring is a Ring in Dungeons and Dragons. Boosts all damage absorption by +25% when HP is 89%+ full.

type.name: Shield Ring
type.description: Shield Ring is a Ring in Dungeons and Dragons. Boosts all damage absorption by +25% when HP is 99%+ full.
